The plot is really nothing new, but the movie itself is fun enough on its own.
Air Conditioning, Coke, Popcorn, what can be bad?...The Movie
This Is Good Old Fashioned Movie Entertainment
inspired me to take film studies....insanely awesome film and anyone involved should be SO freakin proud....exactly what Disney was meant to be

great fantasy film with some comedy moments and brilliant special fx

boring it is worth negative 1 stars
